response.answer_text: Really very good if you are a new learner. I can understand how pleasant it used to be for a new learner to make a program run with no error as I started learning c++ just a year before. But you can make it more good by displaying these 2 numbers as- cout<<”\nTwo numbers you entered are- “<<a<<” and “<<b; Then perform sum operation. Then display sum as- cout<<”\nSum of “<<a<<” and ”<<b<<” is “<<c; Corrections are heartily welcomed. Thank you.
Nice bro!!!! Keep uploading….. You may be great one day… My regards!!!
